review: The only reason I cannot give it 5 stars is that it is not quite as amazing as the FireTV that I also own. It does not have the lightning fast quick-play capabilities that the FireTV has for prime instant-video, and the default remote does not support voice search. Since I got this at initial offering for $20, I decided to add in a voice search remote like the one that comes with the FireTV. In the end that makes the remote almost twice as expensive as the FireTV Stick. Overall, just as many features as the FireTV, just in a smaller and way less expensive form factor. The only other thing to note is that most TVs (especially older ones) do not put out the ~1amp via their USB console port that the FireTV Stick requires, so even though some people claim they can run the FireTV Stick via the USB console port, don't count on it. You will most likely need to plug the stick into the provided USB AC adapter.
